channel.title: Comments for page "The Last Dragon"
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "The Last Dragon"

item.title: The Last Dragon, The Glow, Sho Nuff
item.content:encoded:
This trophy, along with the Glow and the Sho Nuff Elixir, are references…

Hey, wait! Someone already found the reference! Why hasn't it been added to the article?

item.title: (no title)
item.content:encoded: This trophy (along with The Glow, the Sho Nuff Elixir, etc) is a reference to the movie "The Last Dragon". There is a character in the movie named Sho Nuff, and the main character fights with a power called The Glow.
